questions.title: Which deployment strategy do you use ?
questions.description:
This assessment question inquires about the deployment strategy that is utilized within a specific context. Responses may vary
depending on the individual or organization's preferences and priorities. Deployment strategies can include methods such as
continuous deployment, blue-green deployment, canary release, rolling deployment, etc. The chosen strategy typically reflects
factors such as the team's workflow, the nature of the project, the desired frequency of updates, and the level of risk tolerance.
By understanding which deployment strategy is preferred, insights can be gained into the approach to software delivery and the
overall development process.

or machines. From traditional methods like passwords and PINs to more advanced methods like biometrics and two-factor

of authentication processes.
